title: Jessica Chastain: Guillermo creates that balance
text:
Actress Jessica Chastain feels that director Guillermo del Toro Gomez creates a balance in his films, which are visually appealing and involve great story-telling.
Chastain who plays Lady Lucille Sharpe in Universal Pictures' film, says that in the Gomez directorial, every emotion has its equal parts magnified, read a statement.
"Hate and anger come from love; every emotion has its equal parts magnified. Guillermo creates that balance so you never feel like you're playing an empty emotion. You never feel like you're just in a ghost story. You feel like you're telling a story about real people," Chastain said.
The director who has films like Pan's Labyrinth , Hell Boy series and Pacific Rim in his kitty, has Chastain and Tom Hiddleston featuring in his latest film Crimson Peak which is a romantic gothic horror film.
Crimson Peak will release on October 16th.
